line: Me despidieron y siento un vacío en el alma.
tts: Me despidieron y siento un vacío en el alma.
english: I was fired and I feel an emptiness in my soul.
prompt: A solitary figure sits on the edge of a bed in a dimly lit room, holding a crumpled termination letter. Their eyes are distant, staring at the floor, embodying a profound sense of loss and emotional void.

line: Me despidieron y siento un vacío en el corazón.
tts: Me despidieron y siento un vacío en el corazón.
english: I was fired and I feel an emptiness in my heart.
prompt: A person stands alone in a park, surrounded by vibrant nature yet feeling disconnected. Their hand clutches their chest as they gaze at the sky, seeking comfort but only finding solitude.

line: Me despidieron y siento un hueco en el corazón.
tts: Me despidieron y siento un hueco en el corazón.
english: I was fired and I feel a hole in my heart.
prompt: A silhouette against a sunset, with hands outstretched as if trying to fill an invisible void. The sky colors mimic the tumult of emotions within, reflected in their longing expression.

line: Me despidieron y ahora todo tiene un hueco.
tts: Me despidieron y ahora todo tiene un hueco.
english: I was fired and now everything has a gap.
prompt: A living room filled with family photos and personal items but feels hauntingly empty. The absence of a person at its center forms an invisible gap, highlighting the abrupt emptiness pervading their world.

line: Me despidieron y ahora todo tiene un vacío.
tts: Me despidieron y ahora todo tiene un vacío.
english: I was fired and now everything has an emptiness.
prompt: An artist's studio cluttered with unfinished works and unused materials, symbolizing abandoned dreams and ambitions. The artist sits before an empty canvas, reflecting the void left by their recent job loss.

line: Me despidieron y mi vida está llena de vacío.
tts: Me despidieron y mi vida está llena de vacío.
english: I was fired and my life is full of emptiness.
prompt: A room filled with echoes of laughter and joy that now feels silent and hollow. A person stands in the middle, surrounded by memories yet enveloped by an inescapable void.

line: ¿Me despidieron y ahora mi vida está llena de huecos?
tts: ¿Me despidieron y ahora mi vida está llena de huecos?
english: Was I fired and now my life is full of gaps?
prompt: A person looking at themselves in a mirror, seeing cracks spidering across the reflection symbolizing the fractures in their life's path. Each gap represents a missed opportunity or a sudden life change.

line: ¿Por qué siento que mi vida está llena de huecos?
tts: ¿Por qué siento que mi vida está llena de huecos?
english: Why do I feel that my life is full of gaps?
prompt: A person wanders through a dream-like landscape filled with doors, each leading to different life choices. Yet, every door stands ajar, showing unfinished paths with unsatisfying conclusions.

line: ¿Por qué siento que me falta todo en la vida?
tts: ¿Por qué siento que me falta todo en la vida?
english: Why do I feel like I'm missing everything in life?
prompt: A person stands in the middle of a bustling crowd, unnoticed and untouched by the vibrant lives around them. They reach out, yet their hands pass through the scenes, unable to grasp what they desire.

line: ¿Por qué siento un vacío en todo lo que hago?
tts: ¿Por qué siento un vacío en todo lo que hago?
english: Why do I feel an emptiness in everything I do?
prompt: A shadow stretches long behind someone working tirelessly at a desk, papers flying as they work, yet each document dissolves into nothingness symbolizing the futility and ineffectiveness they feel.

line: ¿Por qué siento un vacío en cada respiro?
tts: ¿Por qué siento un vacío en cada respiro?
english: Why do I feel an emptiness in every breath?
prompt: A person stands by an open window, watching the world outside while taking deep breaths, yet feeling as if they are breathing in the void itself. Each breath deepens the inner hollowness rather than refreshing it.

line: ¿Por qué me siento tan perdido en cada respiro?
tts: ¿Por qué me siento tan perdido en cada respiro?
english: Why do I feel so lost with every breath?
prompt: An individual in a forest, breathing heavily yet feeling disoriented and lost despite the path being clear ahead. With each breath, the fog around them thickens, symbolizing the growing sense of being lost.

line: ¿Por qué me siento tan perdido desde que me despidieron?
tts: ¿Por qué me siento tan perdido desde que me despidieron?
english: Why do I feel so lost since I was fired?
prompt: A person stands at a crossroad, every path obscured by a thick fog of uncertainty and doubt since they lost their job, representing their internal struggle to find direction.

line: ¿Por qué siempre tengo esta sensación de estar perdido?
tts: ¿Por qué siempre tengo esta sensación de estar perdido?
english: Why do I always have this feeling of being lost?
prompt: A traveler with a tattered map, sprawled out trying to find their way, yet the landmarks and the path ahead keep changing, mirroring the perpetual feeling of being lost in life.

line: ¿Desde cuándo tengo esta sensación de estar perdido?
tts: ¿Desde cuándo tengo esta sensación de estar perdido?
english: Since when have I had this feeling of being lost?
prompt: A faded photograph contrasts a smiling child with the current downcast adult, pondering over the journey from the innocence of youth to the bewilderment of present-day uncertainties.

line: Desde que me despidieron, todo parece desmoronarse.
tts: Desde que me despidieron, todo parece desmoronarse.
english: Since I was fired, everything seems to be falling apart.
prompt: A series of dominoes in a chain reaction, each falling one after the other, symbolizing the cascading effects one critical life event can trigger, leaving the person watching helplessly.

line: Desde que me despidieron, todo parece colapsar.
tts: Desde que me despidieron, todo parece colapsar.
english: Since I was fired, everything seems to be collapsing.
prompt: A person stands amidst the ruins of a once-bustling metropolis, buildings cracked and crumbling, metaphorically representing the collapse of stability after losing their job.

line: Me despidieron y todo anda en caída libre.
tts: Me despidieron y todo anda en caída libre.
english: I was fired and everything is in freefall.
prompt: Envision an object in space, endlessly spinning as gravity takes hold - symbolic of a life untethered, spiraling without control after suddenly being cut loose.

line: Me despidieron y mi vida va en caída libre.
tts: Me despidieron y mi vida va en caída libre.
english: I was fired and my life is in freefall.
prompt: A roller coaster cresting the peak before a steep drop, the rider's expression frozen in shock, represents the sudden plunge into uncertainty following the job loss.

line: Me despidieron y mi mente está en caos.
tts: Me despidieron y mi mente está en caos.
english: I was fired and my mind is in chaos.
prompt: A cluttered study with papers, books, and notes thrown about, symbols of chaotic thoughts, mirrors the tumultuous storm within after being rendered jobless.

line: Me despidieron y mi mente se siente en caos total.
tts: Me despidieron y mi mente se siente en caos total.
english: I was fired and my mind feels in total chaos.
prompt: A brewing storm overhead mirrors a person's chaotic thoughts, lightning flashing chaotically as they struggle to find clarity amidst an internal maelstrom.

line: Me despidieron y no sé cómo salir del caos.
tts: Me despidieron y no sé cómo salir del caos.
english: I was fired and I don't know how to get out of the chaos.
prompt: A labyrinth with shifting walls and dead ends symbolizes the daunting task of navigating out of chaos, representing the complexity and confusion internally felt.

line: Me despidieron y no sé cómo salir de este lío.
tts: Me despidieron y no sé cómo salir de este lío.
english: I was fired and I don't know how to get out of this mess.
prompt: A tangled ball of string knotted and complex, laid before someone who hesitates to approach, as it mirrors their entangled thoughts on how to escape the messy situation.

line: Me despidieron y no veo la salida de este lío.
tts: Me despidieron y no veo la salida de este lío.
english: I was fired and I don't see the way out of this mess.
prompt: A fog-covered bridge leading into an unclear distance reflects the uncertainty and blindness one experiences when confronting an unsolved and confusing problem.

line: ¿Por qué no veo la salida de este vacío?
tts: ¿Por qué no veo la salida de este vacío?
english: Why don't I see the way out of this emptiness?
prompt: An endless tunnel with no visible exit ahead, the echoes of each futile step symbolize the search for meaning in the relentless journey through loneliness.

line: ¿Por qué no veo cómo salir del vacío?
tts: ¿Por qué no veo cómo salir del vacío?
english: Why don't I see how to get out of the emptiness?
prompt: A vast, open desertscape extending indefinitely under harsh sun highlights both the beauty and the emptiness of the struggle to find direction or escape.

line: ¿Por qué no veo cómo salir del desastre?
tts: ¿Por qué no veo cómo salir del desastre?
english: Why don't I see how to get out of the disaster?
prompt: Surrounded by the aftermath of a storm, debris of memories stretches as far as the eye can see. With each glance a reminder of the mess left to sort through.

line: ¿Por qué no encuentro cómo escapar del desastre?
tts: ¿Por qué no encuentro cómo escapar del desastre?
english: Why don't I find a way to escape the disaster?
prompt: A puzzle piece scattered and strewn, no picture in sight, each choice leading back to confusion, symbolizing the frustrating complexity of escaping turmoil.

line: Estoy atrapado en este vacío, atrapado en el desastre.
tts: Estoy atrapado en este vacío, atrapado en el desastre.
english: I am trapped in this emptiness, trapped in the disaster.
prompt: Envision a person isolated on an island amidst a churning sea, representing both physical and emotional entrapment within a cauldron of chaos and emptiness.

line: Estoy atrapado en esta sensación de vacío.
tts: Estoy atrapado en esta sensación de vacío.
english: I am trapped in this feeling of emptiness.
prompt: A small boat adrift on an open ocean, sees no land in sight, only waves that speak of the relentless hold of an empty existence surrounding them.

line: Estoy atrapado y el miedo me consume.
tts: Estoy atrapado y el miedo me consume.
english: I am trapped and fear consumes me.
prompt: A figure stands frozen in place as shadows creep up, each tendril of darkness representing fear that creeps slowly inward, consuming their sense of self.

line: ¡Claro, el miedo me consume!
tts: ¡Claro, el miedo me consume!
english: Of course, fear consumes me!
prompt: Inside a dimly lit room, fear manifests as a looming form in the corner, ever-present and watching, showing its power through its daunting presence.

line: El miedo desde que me despidieron me consume.
tts: El miedo desde que me despidieron me consume.
english: The fear since I was fired consumes me.
prompt: A once brightly colored tapestry begins to unravel as dark, creeping thorns symbolize the encroaching dread dominating thoughts since a sudden life change.

line: El pánico desde que me despidieron me consume.
tts: El pánico desde que me despidieron me consume.
english: The panic since I was fired consumes me.
prompt: A person sits surrounded by mirrors, each reflecting a different panic-stricken expression trapping them in an echo chamber of growing anxiety.

line: El pánico de sentir que nada tiene sentido.
tts: El pánico de sentir que nada tiene sentido.
english: The panic of feeling that nothing makes sense.
prompt: In a room of swirling, mismatched images and sounds, a figure turns desperately in all directions, trying to find a center as the chaos of a meaningless world closes in.

line: El pánico de sentir que estoy perdido.
tts: El pánico de sentir que estoy perdido.
english: The panic of feeling that I am lost.
prompt: A dense fog encapsulates every step, encroaching from all sides, as the figure within struggles to find bearings in a shapeless world.

line: El pánico me atrapa en este desastre.
tts: El pánico me atrapa en este desastre.
english: The panic traps me in this disaster.
prompt: A spool spinning wildly out of control, threads entangling all within reach, shows the binding and suffocating fear in a personal disaster.

line: Me atrapa y no veo una puerta de salida.
tts: Me atrapa y no veo una puerta de salida.
english: It traps me and I don't see a way out.
prompt: A maze of towering walls with no visible exit mirrors the feeling of being caught in circumstances, where every path leads back to despair.

line: Me atrapa y las noches son interminables.
tts: Me atrapa y las noches son interminables.
english: It traps me and the nights are endless.
prompt: In a twilight world, a clock face spins without hands to mark the hour, representing the endless, unfocused nights where time seems to stagnate under the weight of fear.

line: Las noches son interminables y llenas de preguntas.
tts: Las noches son interminables y llenas de preguntas.
english: The nights are endless and full of questions.
prompt: A ceiling, painted with question marks, shadows flicker erratically as a person stares unblinkingly, searching for answers in the scrolling thoughts of a restless night.

line: Las noches son solo preguntas interminables.
tts: Las noches son solo preguntas interminables.
english: The nights are just endless questions.
prompt: An infinite hallway lined with doors labeled ‘Why’ and ‘How’, each one leading to another doorway, captures the frustrating, cyclic nature of unanswered questions tormenting the mind.

line: Las dudas me invaden todas las noches.
tts: Las dudas me invaden todas las noches.
english: Doubts invade me every night.
prompt: Beneath a starless sky, shadows of doubts slither into an open window, seeding uncertainty into the dreaming mind and shifting the sleeper’s peaceful rest into turmoil.

line: Las dudas invaden cada rincón de mi cabeza.
tts: Las dudas invaden cada rincón de mi cabeza.
english: Doubts invade every corner of my head.
prompt: A chalkboard of crossed-out equations and scribbled notes, resembling a battlefield of clashing thoughts, fills a room with no space left for clarity.

line: Las dudas, el miedo, el pánico... todo invade mi mente.
tts: Las dudas, el miedo, el pánico... todo invade mi mente.
english: Doubts, fear, panic... all invade my mind.
prompt: A multi-layered painting of chaotic, swirling strokes represents a storm of emotions that overwhelm the mind in layers upon layers of mental turmoil.

line: ¿El miedo siempre estuvo ahí?
tts: ¿El miedo siempre estuvo ahí?
english: Was the fear always there?
prompt: A time-lapsed video of a seed growing into a gnarled tree, casting a creeping shadow over the landscape, shows the underlying question of whether this emotion has always silently thrived.

line: ¿El pánico siempre estuvo presente?
tts: ¿El pánico siempre estuvo presente?
english: Was the panic always present?
prompt: A haunted house on a hill, threatening yet tantalizingly familiar, stands as a testament to the lurking presence of panic, waiting to appear.

line: ¿Las dudas siempre invadieron mi mente?
tts: ¿Las dudas siempre invadieron mi mente?
english: Have the doubts always invaded my mind?
prompt: Constellations forming shifting patterns in the sky, each alignment questioning deeply held certainties, symbolizes the continuous infiltration of doubt in one's worldview.

line: ¿Qué pasará ahora que todo está en el aire?
tts: ¿Qué pasará ahora que todo está en el aire?
english: What will happen now that everything is up in the air?
prompt: Pieces of a jigsaw puzzle tossed into the wind, spiraling upward into an expansive sky of possibilities yet uncertainty, depict the unpredictability of a future unraveled.

line: ¿Qué haré con este miedo y este vacío?
tts: ¿Qué haré con este miedo y este vacío?
english: What will I do with this fear and this emptiness?
prompt: An empty journal with a pen poised above blank pages, representing the daunting task of reshaping one's narrative amidst the twin shadows of fear and emptiness.
